text.en:
1 Level 9 "Infernoble Knight Emperor Charles" equipped with an Equip Card
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Infernoble Knight Emperor Charles" in your GY; this card's name becomes that monster's original name, and replace this effect with that monster's original effects, then equip it to this card as an Equip Spell that gives it 500 ATK. Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Spell from your hand or face-up field to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

materials: 1 Level 9 "Infernoble Knight Emperor Charles" equipped with an Equip Card
